title: [K-12] Designing Learning Problem Diagnosis and Resolution Strategies in the Post-Pandemic Era

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of foundational educational theories and general familiarity with educational settings
context.additional_context: Focuses on exploring the essential characteristics of post-pandemic learning challenges through phenomenological research methods and seeking practical solutions applicable to real educational settings

learning_goals: Learners can analyze key post-pandemic learning issues (lack of motivation, resource limitations, instructional design problems, etc.) using a phenomenological approach
Learners can design strategic frameworks for solving educational problems based on teachers' and learners' experiences
Learners can propose effective motivation enhancement and resource management strategies in blended learning environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
